about.bio: I am a journalist specialized in human narratives and social analysis. My work focuses on exploring the complex realities of our contemporary society through written word and documentary imagery. Trained at the Complutense University of Madrid, I have developed my career combining rigorous research with an ethical and empathetic approach to the stories I tell.

photography.intro: Documentary photography allows me to capture moments that reflect social and human reality. Each image tells a story, documents an instant of truth that deserves to be preserved and shared.

photos.caption: Municipal library as a meeting space

reports.title: The student housing crisis in Madrid
reports.summary: An in-depth analysis of the difficulties students face in finding affordable housing in the capital. The report includes interviews with those affected, official data, and proposed solutions from student associations.

reports.title: Women in journalism: breaking glass ceilings
reports.summary: Report on the situation of women journalists in Spain. Interviews with established professionals and young women opening paths in traditional and digital media, analyzing the challenges and opportunities in the sector.

reports.title: Neighborhood transformation: gentrification and resistance
reports.summary: Investigation into gentrification processes in central Madrid. Voices from long-time residents, new residents, and merchants reflecting the changes and tensions in the urban territory.

reports.title: Disinformation and social media: the election case
reports.summary: Analysis of how disinformation spread during the last general elections. Fact-checking, expert interviews, and proposals to improve media literacy in digital society.

reports.title: The future of local journalism in the digital age
reports.summary: Report on how local media are adapting to digital transformation. Success stories, economic challenges, and the fundamental role of proximity journalism in local democracies.

work.description: Training in journalistic writing, research, photography, video and radio editing. Specialization in investigative journalism and digital communication.
Article writing, coverage of university events, interviews and reports. Learning in the day-to-day of a digital newsroom.
Writing articles on culture, society and current affairs. Teamwork with editors and photographers.
Event organization, training workshops and content creation for social media. Promotion of responsible journalism among young people.
